pages.text: $(bold)目标：$()巨灵附身$(br2)$(thing)伊哈根奴役术$()会强迫$(thing)巨灵$()附身于一个邻接生物。该五芒星不会导致永久禁锢，魔灵和被附身的生物都会在短时间内死亡。

pages.title: 用途
pages.text: $(li)$(l:rituals/possession/possess_enderman)被附身的末影人$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/possession/possess_ghast)被附身的恶魂$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_otherworld_bird)具翼使魔$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_bat)蝙蝠使魔$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_cthulhu)克苏鲁使魔$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_devil)恶魔使魔$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_dragon)龙使魔$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_headless_ratman)无头鼠骑士使魔$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_chimera)奇美拉使魔$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_beholder)眼魔使魔$(/l)$()
